text: Sore de kare (yūsufu) wa, otōto no fukuro (no kensa) o suru mae ni, kare-ra no fukuro o (shirabe) hajimeta. Soshite (ato ni) otōto no fukuro kara, sore o sagashidashita. Ware wa kono yō ni, yūsufu ni sakuryaku o sazuketa. Arrā ga nozoma reru igai ni wa, kare wa otōto o (Ejiputo kuni)-ō no hōritsu no shita de yokuryū suru koto ga dekinakatta nodearu. Ware wa hossuru mono no (eichi no)-kai kurai o takameru. Subete no chisha no ue ni zenchinaru okata wa iru
